top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know
Barbra the barista! Thanks for the tour ro! Beautiful house! 💓

comments_since_last_sample.body:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know
Can I move in Ro! I’m in love! ❤️❤️
Jemma, call the coffee machine jemma
What's in my kitchen and what's in my pantry
Barbra has to be the name of the coffee maker😊

Your house is very beautiful! I am curious though, how do you handle conducting business from your house? I’m very much a person that needs a boundary set between work and home, do you have ways of going about that?
Yay your house is so pretty and shiny ✨
If my mum saw this house, she'd be in LOVE with it.
Rosanna Pansino I think your new house is awesome but can you please do a barley field recipe because of Halloween we also like to celebrate Diwali please I am not forcing you
New fridge tour please now. Thanks
Wow I cannot believe this is your 3rd house tour video! I’m so proud of you and everything you’ve accomplished Ro! Your house is absolutely stunning!! Love you!!! ❤️❤️❤️
Ro works so hard on everything ily 😍 💓 💖 💗 💕 💛 😍 💓 😭😭😭
I really would like to see your room tour I mean your bedroom tour. Can you please please please please please pretty pretty please do that? that?
Yes I wanted a house tour forever 😁
As an up and coming interior designer just makes me so happy to see how far you’ve come and how beautiful the house turned out to be!
Barbra the barista! Thanks for the tour ro! Beautiful house! 💓
